https://search.earthdata.nasa.gov/search.Description: The Earthdata Search Disaster Dashboard is a collection of near real-time imagery and data products from NASA and other agencies that may be useful for monitoring, responding to, and researching natural and man-made disasters. The dashboard is a subset of the larger Earthdata Search collection.

https://doi.org/10.5067/FIRMS/VIIRS/VJ11.Description: The VJ114IMGTDL_NRT dataset provides near real-time (NRT) satellite detection of active fires. These data may aid in air quality research following a disaster.

https://search.earthdata.nasa.gov/search.Description: The Earthdata Search Disaster Dashboard is a collection of near real-time imagery and data products from NASA and other agencies that may be useful for monitoring, responding to, and researching natural and man-made disasters. The dashboard is a subset of the larger Earthdata Search collection.

The Earthdata Search Disaster Dashboard is a collection of near real-time imagery and data products from NASA and other agencies that may be useful in monitoring, preparing for, and responding to natural disasters such as hurricanes, flooding, and wildfires. The dashboard is a customized search interface within Earthdata Search that allows users to search, discover, visualize, and access data from multiple datasets in support of disaster research and response.

The Earthdata Search Disaster Dashboard is a collection of near real-time imagery and data products from NASA and other agencies that may be useful for monitoring, responding to, and researching natural and man-made disasters. The dashboard is a subset of the larger Earthdata Search collection.
